results.definition: do random, unplanned work or activities or spend time idly
a person who enjoys fixing and experimenting with machines and their parts

examples: Can you tinker with the T.V. set--it's not working right

results.definition: formerly a person (traditionally a Gypsy) who traveled from place to place mending pots and kettles and other metal utensils as a way to earn a living
work as a tinker or tinkerer
